impact of airborne allergens like dust and dander

Use Natural Pesticides

While they may protect the plant
they’re purposed for, pesticides can
contaminate soil & non-target plants.

Explore our latest
collections of plants

To be certified organic you must demonstrate the source of your
ingredients from farm to formulation and it is a requirement of our
certifiers that we do not use any endangered plants in our
products and that any plants we do use are sustainably sourced.
